page.title: 19Shopping
page.content: Since Newport and Wormit are close to Dundee, lots of people do their bulk shopping once a week in a large store there like Tesco or Asda. People also do specialist shopping in Dundee, for instance furniture or carpets. Newport and Wormit's small shops are mainly good for odd things that have been forgotten in the weekly shopping or if things are quickly needed. We interviewed Mr. Brown the owner of Sinclair's, a well known, family grocers. He told us that he may have to make somebody redundant because the rates on his shop have become so high. He also told us that basics such as butter, sugar, tea and bread sell best. We found that 75% of his goods came from various "cash and carries" and the rest from wholesalers such as "Mother's Pride".
